Fairgrieve & Horner records

http://fairgrieveandhorner.com A fully responsive custom Wordpress theme for a boutique record label.
Fairgrieve & Horner records

Indie record labels hold a special place in my heart. I've worked at three of them now, and the website for Fairgrieve & Horner is one I'm especially proud of.

CSS and Javascript Keyboard Atlantic Brewery

More examples of my work:

  • Atlantic Brewery A responsive e-commerce site for one Cornwall's best craft-beer brewers.
  • CSS and Javascript Keyboard A working piano keyboard built using the Web Audio API and styled with CSS.
  • E.C. Dawson & Company A dynamic band site with Twitter and Soundcloud integration.
  • Cassette Script Typeface Cassette Script is a quirky handwriting font with over 200 characters.
  • Eaten by Monsters music blog An award-winning, taste-making, discourse-shaping powerhouse (albeit in a very specific niche).
